prompts: Create a cute Normal-type Pokemon that loves to eat and sleep.
Show me a small, fluffy creature with a round body and big eyes.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that roams around forests and grasslands.
Design a chubby Pokemon that has a blue and gray color scheme.
Give me a Munchlax that embodies the essence of relaxation and food.
Generate a friendly Pokemon with a laid-back personality and sweet tooth.
Make a round Pokemon that is always on the lookout for snacks.

distinctive_features: Wide mouth with a small tongue
